title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: compound satin
description: Dark blue satin ground with small-scale, all-over repeat of scrolling vine with five-petalled flowers, in gold. Fragment cut on bias, edges turned over, as if for collar. Starched or stiffened on back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: compound satin. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-12.
